column1: 1 bbq chicken leftover from dinner last night&nbsp
1 serving pork chop from Crazy Plates cookbook
1 serving spanish style rice from Crazy Plates
1 marshmallow mudslide brownie from One Smart Cookie cookbook&nbsp
So not such a great day in terms of points, but I didn't eat any junk food which is a plus.&nbsp
column2: I also have all my flex points left, so really it wasn't such a bad day today.&nbsp

column1: *I got up pretty late (noonish) so I didn't eat lunch, and instead had an early dinner.
1 serving (2 small pieces) bbq chicken breast from Crazy Plates cookbook
1 serving dill scalloped potatoes from Looneyspoons cookbook
1 marshmallow mudslide brownie from One Smart Cookie cookbook
event,"Dear anyone on Weight Watchers or any other weight loss program,
You must go out and buy Looneyspoons and Crazy Plates .
column2: Two awesome cookbooks which are low in calories and fat.&nbsp
column3: The food in these books taste amazing and the dishes are really easy to prepare.&nbsp

column1: Also, if you're looking for low fat cookies and bars check outOne Smart Cookie.
column2: Again, the recipes are really simple but are extremely good and not high in points (or fat, or calories).&nbsp

column1: These three cookbooks (along with this one) have gotten me through most of my time on Weight Watchers.
event,"So I thought that this little weight tracker was cute.&nbsp
column2: So I will have it posted every Friday to monitor my weight loss (Fridays will be my weigh day).

column1: As you can see I have a long way to go, but I know if I just stick to it and keep on track I'll eventually get to where I want to be."
